addr: 8 East 36th Street. Between Madison & 5th Avenues. New York, NY 10016
title: Seinfeld Thanksgiving Trivia
desc: "My father was a stern man. He forbad us to participate in any activities that he thought were associated with the common man. The Thanksgiving Day Parade was first on the list." Could you identify the next song? Could you? Could you? You're invited to Tim Whatley's Night-Before-Thanksgiving party at Slattery's Midtown Pub on Monday, November 23 starting 7pm. FIVE challenging rounds of Seinfeld Trivia on Jon Voight's '89 LeBaron, including a few rounds on the episode, "The Mom and Pop Store" and other Thanksgiving-related hodgepodge.? Reserve your spot holding a rope under Woody Woodpecker at; http://SeinfeldThanksgiving.Eventbrite.com The best way to reserve tickets is by selecting a team captain and having them be in charge of tickets for ALL team members. For example, if Jerry, George, Kramer and Elaine are a team and Elaine gets put in charge, she will then reserve tickets for herself, Jerry, George and Kramer = (4) in total. PLEASE ONLY RESERVE SINGLE TICKETS IF YOU ARE PLAYING BY YOURSELF. We will send a confirmation email to everyone closer to the event. "Next Stop Pottersville!"
